Text: I screwed something up. Sorry about that, brothers!!

JW- no need to apologize, it's just a minor glitch. :)

Mega ditto thanks!

Thanks again!!!! I'm listening and Rove is doing great. Btw, it may be better to encode in 64kbps/44.1khz (or 48khz if you recorded it with that). So long as you use the best encoding setting this is more than adequate for talk radio...... The reason I mention it is because my ISP here in New Zealand no longer has flatrate plans, and halving the bitrate will halve the filesize.
@flyingkiwi & J Whitt: What recording programs do you use?
Rove was great.  He should get his own show.
thunderbum: When I used to record The Phil Hendrie Show I used Cooledit to record then WinLAME to encode.
